website_summaries.verdict: A premium spearfishing wetsuit that provides a wider range of movement, ventilation, and all-over comfort than your average wetsuit.
pros: Available in multiple sizes, small to XXL
cons: This is a particularly expensive spearfishing wetsuit
Only available in the single camo pattern

customer_reviews.title: Great camo, but not a fan
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. The hood is somewhat constricting and gets in the way of the mask but the seams are strong and the padding is definitely in all the right places. It feels thicker than 1.8 mm, but that could just be me. I have the 2.5mm gloves and booties as well and it feels about that thick. The layering is kind of irritating. I used to wear wetsuits to surf and I like the one piece style a little more than the pants and top style this suit uses. The camo pattern is perfect though. It blends right in with the bottom in the Florida Keys.
customer_reviews.author: Double T

customer_reviews.title: I loved the camo pattern and the fit of this wetsuit ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the camo pattern and the fit of this wetsuit and was really excited to get some use out of it. Three dives later under normal circumstances (I take extremely good care of my gear) and there are multiple tears I've found throughout the suit for whatever reason. I'm extremely disappointed and wish I just went with a more expensive suit.
customer_reviews.author: cassie cotarelo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Suit: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3mm standard suit I've been diving in and was putting off getting this suit for a couple of months for some reason. Got it in the mail the other day and got the chance to dive in it and what a difference. I should have gotten this one first!! I usually start getting cold at 1.5 hrs. Well.. after 4 hours, I was still going strong and only got out b/x my buddy with a MAKO suit got cold and got out. HA!!
customer_reviews.author: SB_Ironman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice suit
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice suit. Its a little tight in the groin as well as the armpits... maybe consider going a size larger than you think. But other than that can't wait to put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Grossman

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was wearing a 5mm Neosport + 3mm Vest + Lavacore.....this suit is still warmer and much more mobility. I'm extremely happy with my purchase. Water is in the high 50's right now and I actually had to let a little water in so that I wasn't so hot.
customer_reviews.author: SheepdogShaun

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suit. I'm 5'11" 200 fat pounds atm and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic suit. I'm 5'11" 200 fat pounds atm and it's just on the large side of a perfect fit. If I were skinnier it would probably be too big. I bought it for freediving in 60 degree waters and it's WARM! For the first hour I'm hot, after that it's fantastic. The 5mm probably would have been the smarter choice but it'll get used for scuba as well so the extra thickness will be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: crzydvr

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm and tight
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to spear fish in cold water, this is the suit you want! It is extremely tight so make sure you put it on when your body and the suit is dry. I spear fish in some cold waters in Alaska and surprisingly the experience is bearable, still cold. Since I do not have much body fat (195lbs @~13%BF), you can expect a lot of weight to become slightly under bouyant. I need around 32 - 36 lbs of weight to ensure I sink.
customer_reviews.author: bringdapain

customer_reviews.title: It fits great! Just get the suit wet to ease putting ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9 and 165 and I ordered the M3. It fits great ! Just get the suit wet to ease putting it on. I love it. Free diver/ scuba
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: but it fit better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Turns out they sent me an XL/5 instead of a L/4, but it fit better than I expected. Wasn't excessively loose anywhere, although there are a few extra folds in the armpit area, but I guess that means it's time to work on my arms more at the gym! I'm 6' 175lbs with lifter thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Don't be careless when putting on your suit and it will never tear.
customer_reviews.text: Some people are giving this suit a hard time for easily tearing with their nails. Since I'm writing this review a year after i bought it and gotten 25+ uses out of it so far, I can say it is still a great dive suit. Yes, the neoprene on the inside will tear if you don't treat it with some care, just as any other suit.
customer_reviews.author: Xander

customer_reviews.title: Beware because Large is actually x mall.
customer_reviews.text: I am size S , but in this case, I ordered L. I had to return it because even large, does not fit me. This is probably Italian Large is small in America, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Oliva

customer_reviews.title: To Buoyant
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality suit but just to buoyant for me. I have other 3.5 suits that do not require as much weights to compensate. For freediving it is just better to have the least buoyant suit one can find.
customer_reviews.author: M Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice, I take very good care of my wetsuits and it has four tears in it, very poor quality, will return
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Willson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wetsuit. Always warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wetsuit. Always warm enough, even in almost freezing temperatures. These days I use it mostly for (kite) surfing. Getting it on and off requires some practice. I recommend putting some hair conditioner on the inside of arms, legs and torso before putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Till Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Busted
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder straps tore the first time I used it. Had to sew it myself
customer_reviews.author: David Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for moderate temp diving
customer_reviews.text: Second one ive owned. First one lasted 3 or so years, washed after every dive, used countless times. Great suit for moderate temp diving.
customer_reviews.author: Molly D.

customer_reviews.title: I used this in 45F water and I was almost ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this in 45F water and I was almost too warm. Remember to use conditioner to get it on. Don't put it on dry!
customer_reviews.author: rachid Arnick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Happy customers
customer_reviews.text: My son was extremely happy with an early Christmas present. Arrived on time and fit perfectly. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Quick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got a fantastic price, I played with you !! 143 usd .
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Mendonça Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good open cell just need to lubricate before you get in or else you might rip it.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this Neoprene suit very much! Great design, quality product, good material.
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: Mobility of a 3mm but the warmth of a 7. Very durable and easy to get on and off. Perfect for great Lakes diving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels great. Much more boyant than expected. Be prepared to add on the extra weights for this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Hiram Machado

customer_reviews.title: Incredible for the price you pay, just notice the ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible for the price you pay, just notice the thickness. I dive in San Diego in water that's about 65-70 degrees. I am warm but anything much colder you may be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter brandalise

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight ( soap or some lube needed )
customer_reviews.text: Great suit , make sure you have some soap in order to make it fit your body
customer_reviews.author: Djecko 15

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything its ok but I had to remove the hood, the hood is the only problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality suit nice and warm and it fits true to size. I liked this suit so much I purchased a 5mm for winter!!
customer_reviews.author: warren patterson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice suit. Definitely made of quality material
customer_reviews.text: Really nice suit. Definitely made of quality material. I was really unsure about buying a 2-peice and having those little clips right at my balls but after wearing it and diving in it I really wasn't bothered at all and it fit well so I can't say it's a concern anymore. The camo pattern is pretty nice and the suit itself is ergonomically designed for your body fr a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Allen B.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good *update 1/2" tare after first use
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE -Used this suit for the first time and it had a 1/2" tare. Giving this suit a 2 star review for that. Just got the package today. I'm 6' 220 pounds with a waste size of 34 I got the large and it fits ok, a little tight but hey it's a wetsuit. The camo is really cool looking and it's very warm, I was sweating putting this thing on although that's probably due to me having so much trouble getting the damn thing on my oversized body. Overall I would recommend it. I'll leave a review of how it holds up this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Extremely warm and flexible
customer_reviews.text: If you fall between 2 sizes on the chart, go for the largest. This wetsuit is extremely warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Allergy caused me and my body is very hot in the tropics.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos G. Rosado Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Nice design I.m looking for and fits me well
customer_reviews.text: Really good enough as it is written above. i am 5.9foot and 161 lbs. it is a little tight than I expextation.
customer_reviews.author: Yong Cho

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Great suit... My husband can't stay out of the water now.. Lol. Would recommend this to anyone. Delivered before expected time as well. We am very pleased. Thank you. :)
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: item looks similar but there is no "CRESSI" logo on ...
customer_reviews.text: item looks similar but there is no "CRESSI" logo on the front of the hood , it is not the same as item described,
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Xxl suit
customer_reviews.text: Decent suit but the face hole is really small, if you have a big head like me the chin comes all the way up over my mouth, pretty crappy design it's like they use one size hole for every suit. Once you cram a set of goggles on and a snorkel in your mouth it's pretty uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: liked the design of the wet suit
customer_reviews.text: liked the design of the wet suit. However, after first dive session found a 1/2" tare in it. Were'nt so happy then!
customer_reviews.author: Charry

customer_reviews.title: I love this costume
customer_reviews.text: I love this costume. It keeps me very warm. Sometimes I even have to let some cold water inside of the hood to cool off a little bit. The only issue I keep having is how difficult it is to put on these costumes, hehe. I tried soapy water, it helps a little bit, but I guess I have to practice more. But quality of this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Denys Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Technica
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, well built suit. Fit very true to size charts. If your in between sizes go with the smaller size. This suit is very stretchy and comfortable. The chin doesn't quite fit right but I blame my face on that one. The elbow and knee pad design is bad ass.
customer_reviews.author: Rudeboy3300

customer_reviews.title: Very hot, excellent fit.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried this out in cold water yet but in the 2 minutes I tried it on at home I was sweating buckets. The fit is excellent but I had a few problems taking off the top portion by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Xinjiang

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit great!
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is very good I probably will have this one for a long time. Not only does the wetsuit look awesome it fits perfectly and kept me warm. The plus for me too was that I got it in 3 days was shipped from NJ to Hilo Hawaii. That was awesome thank you for the fast shipping and great product.
customer_reviews.author: David Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and needed for spear fishing...great fit and comfortable ..wouldn't prefer anything else but Cressi for my diving needs...
customer_reviews.author: Island Boy

customer_reviews.title: Perfeita!
customer_reviews.text: A roupa alem de extremamente confortavel tem otimaa resistencia aos esbarroes em pedras, ela mantem a temperatura docorpo por horas, ja mergulhei em aguas com ate 18 graus Celsius sem sentir nenhum frio, se a agua tiver por volta dos 23 faz ate calor, ai e so abaixar o capuz e partir pra pescaria.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

product_meta.title: Cressi Man Spearfishing Premium Camouflage Neoprene Wetsuit | Tecnica: designed in Italy
product_meta.description: The Tecnica is the 2-pieces wetsuit designed for spearfishing men. It is made with a special computer molding technology of camouflage, which maintains the softness of the material very high. Completely made in Neoprene Ultraspan to offer the ultimate in comfort, freedom of movement, ventilation and dress. Nylon patches in correspondence to the upper part of the jacket, cap and calfskin. The interior is coated with black Metallite, a material that guarantees great wear and tear and makes it easy to put the suit on and take it off. Both the arms and legs of the suit are ergonomically preformed to fit the natural position of your body for added comfort and fit. The high top pants have durable Powertex knee pads. High-wasted trousers with watertight Smoothskin seals at the ankles and waist. Built-in hooded jacket, elbow reinforcements and ample stern support for rifle loading. Inguinal closure with hanging hooks.
feature_bullets: Should fit snug, but not too tight
Cressi is a REAL diving, snorkeling and spear fishing Italian brand, since 1946.
The Tecnica is the 2-pieces wetsuit designed for spearfishing men. Special computer molding technology of mimetic pattern.
Made in Neoprene Ultraspan to offer the ultimate in comfort, freedom of movement, ventilation and dress.
Nylon patches in correspondence to the upper part of the jacket, cap and calfskin.
Interior coated with black Metallite, a special finish that make easy the donning & doffing.
